<div class="fc-item fc-item--force-image-upgrade fc-item--has-image fc-item--pillar-arts fc-item--type-article js-fc-item fc-item--list-media-mobile fc-item--standard-tablet js-snappable" data-id="film/2019/oct/23/rose-mcgowan-harvey-weinstein-lawsuit-rape-allegations" data-item-visibility="all" data-link-name="news | group-1 | card-@4" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/ctxn6" data-test-id="facia-card">

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2019/oct/23/what-caused-the-superhero-backlash"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Auteurs assemble!</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">What caused the superhero backlash?</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">

<div class="fc-item fc-item--has-cutout fc-item--has-image fc-item--has-metadata fc-item--is-commentable fc-item--pillar-news fc-item--type-comment js-fc-item fc-item--list-media-mobile fc-item--standard-tablet js-snappable" data-discussion-closed="false" data-discussion-url="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2019/oct/23/not-even-boriss-narcissism-can-protect-him-as-cracks-show#comments" data-id="politics/2019/oct/23/not-even-boriss-narcissism-can-protect-him-as-cracks-show" data-item-visibility="all" data-link-name="comment | group-1 | card-@4" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/ctx4j" data-test-id="facia-card">
<div class="fc-item__container">
<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2019/oct/23/not-even-boriss-narcissism-can-protect-him-as-cracks-show"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon">
<svg class="inline-garnett-quote__svg inline-icon__svg" height="49" viewbox="0 0 35 25" width="70">
<path d="M69.587.9c-1.842 15.556-3.89 31.316-4.708 48.1H37.043c3.07-16.784 8.391-32.544 17.602-48.1h14.942zM32.949.9c-2.047 15.556-4.094 31.316-4.912 48.1H.2C3.066 32.216 8.592 16.456 17.598.9h15.35z"></path>
</svg> </span> <span class="js-headline-text">Not even the PM's narcissism can protect him as cracks show</span></span> </a></h3>
<div class="fc-item__byline">
John Crace
</div>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Boris Johnson appears rattled and even his own backbenchers see a false prophet
</div>

<li class="fc-slice__item l-list__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link">
<div class="fc-item fc-item--has-image fc-item--has-metadata fc-item--is-commentable fc-item--pillar-arts fc-item--type-review js-fc-item fc-item--list-mobile fc-item--list-media-tablet js-snappable" data-discussion-closed="false" data-discussion-url="https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2019/oct/23/warrior-women-with-lupita-nyongo-review-a-kick-ass-tale-worthy-of-an-oscar#comments" data-id="tv-and-radio/2019/oct/23/warrior-women-with-lupita-nyongo-review-a-kick-ass-tale-worthy-of-an-oscar" data-item-visibility="all" data-link-name="review | group-0 | card-@5" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/chyzm" data-test-id="facia-card">
<div class="fc-item__container">
<div class="fc-item__media-wrapper">
<span class="u-h">4 out of 5 stars.</span>
<div aria-hidden="true" class="stars fc-item__stars">
<span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden">
<svg class="star__item__svg star__item--golden__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" width="14">
<path d="M0 5.2L3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z"></path>
</svg> </span>
<span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden">

<div class="fc-podcast-container__episode-details">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h2 class="fc-item__title"> <a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/news/audio/2019/oct/24/naomi-klein-on-how-politics-can-solve-the-climate-crisis-podcast">
<div class="fc-item__kicker">
Podcast
</div>
<div class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline">
<span class="js-headline-text">Naomi Klein on how politics can solve the climate crisis</span>
</div> </a> </h2>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Activist and author Naomi Klein tells Anushka Asthana that combating the climate crisis must be at the heart of an urgent restructuring of politics and the economy. Plus: Daniel Trilling on the shocking discovery of 39 bodies inside a lorry in Essex
<br/>
</div>
</div>
<div class="fc-podcast-container__subscribe fc-podcast-container__subscribe-large">

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/oct/23/labour-election-brexit-boris-johnson-jeremy-corbyn"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon">
<svg class="inline-garnett-quote__svg inline-icon__svg" height="49" viewbox="0 0 35 25" width="70">
<path d="M69.587.9c-1.842 15.556-3.89 31.316-4.708 48.1H37.043c3.07-16.784 8.391-32.544 17.602-48.1h14.942zM32.949.9c-2.047 15.556-4.094 31.316-4.912 48.1H.2C3.066 32.216 8.592 16.456 17.598.9h15.35z"></path>
</svg> </span> <span class="js-headline-text">Its time for Labour to bite the bullet and embrace an election</span></span> </a></h3>
<div class="fc-item__byline">
Owen Jones
</div>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
If the party picks up Johnsons gauntlet, it must pitch itself as the antidote to an arrogant Tory establishment
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/picture/2019/oct/23/steve-bell-never-mind-mr-johnson-cartoon"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Cartoon</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Steve Bell: never mind, Mr Johnson</span></span> </a></h3>

The prime minister finds himself in uncharted waters after MPs voted down bis bid to fast-track the Brexit bill

<h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/oct/23/if-enough-people-stayed-in-their-hometowns-we-could-build-a-better-britain"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon">

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/sport/2019/oct/23/england-ford-farrell-axis-new-zealand-rugby-world-cup-semi-final"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Rugby World Cup</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">England set to restore Ford-Farrell axis for New Zealand semi-final</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
George Ford is expected to face New Zealand in the World Cup semi-final, with Eddie Jones springing another England selection surprise
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div> </li>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2019/oct/23/genk-liverpool-champions-league-match-report"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Genk 1-4 Liverpool</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Oxlade-Chamberlains double flourish eases Reds to win</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">

</div>

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/sport/blog/2019/oct/23/royal-and-ancient-golf-women-changing-room-old-course"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon">
<svg class="inline-garnett-quote__svg inline-icon__svg" height="49" viewbox="0 0 35 25" width="70">
<path d="M69.587.9c-1.842 15.556-3.89 31.316-4.708 48.1H37.043c3.07-16.784 8.391-32.544 17.602-48.1h14.942zM32.949.9c-2.047 15.556-4.094 31.316-4.912 48.1H.2C3.066 32.216 8.592 16.456 17.598.9h15.35z"></path>
</svg> </span> <span class="js-headline-text">R&amp;A finally gets round to installing a womens changing room</span></span> </a></h3>
<div class="fc-item__byline">
Ewan Murray
</div>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Five years after finally admitting female members the R&amp;A has finally made a decision to let them get changed on the premises at the Old Course
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
<a aria-label="25 comments" class="fc-trail__count fc-trail__count--commentcount" data-link-name="Comment count" href="https://www.theguardian.com/sport/blog/2019/oct/23/royal-and-ancient-golf-women-changing-room-old-course#comments"><span class="inline-tone-fill inline-comment-16 inline-icon"><svg height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="M13 0l1 1v7l-1 1h-6l-2 3h-1v-3h-2l-1-1v-7l1-1h11z"></path></svg></span> 25</a></div>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2019/oct/23/relief-for-windrush-sisters-as-removal-threat-overturned"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Windrush immigration</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Relief for sisters as removal threat overturned</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Bumi Thomas, whose sister got citizenship, wins appeal against removal from UK
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-hidden="true" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2019/oct/23/relief-for-windrush-sisters-as-removal-threat-overturned" tabindex="-1">Relief for sisters as removal threat overturned</a>
</div>
</div> </li>
<li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link">
<div class="fc-item fc-item--has-image fc-item--pillar-news fc-item--type-article js-fc-item fc-item--list-media-mobile fc-item--standard-tablet js-snappable" data-id="uk-news/2019/oct/23/northern-ireland-troubles-proceedings-truth-process" data-item-visibility="all" data-link-name="news | group-2 | card-@2" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/ctx65" data-test-id="facia-card">
<div class="fc-item__container">
<div class="fc-item__media-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__image-container u-responsive-ratio">
<picture>

</section>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/books/booksblog/2019/oct/23/president-supervillain-behind-the-alarmingly-accurate-trump-marvel-mashup"><span class="fc-item__kicker">President Supervillain</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Behind the alarmingly accurate Trump-Marvel mashup</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2019/oct/24/doxiepoos-and-puggles-is-hybrid-breeding-healthier-for-owners-and-dogs"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Doxiepoos and puggles</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Is hybrid breeding healthier for owners and dogs?</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Healthy, hypoallergenic and really, really cute  thats the promise of a designer crossbreed dog, and people are paying thousands for them
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
<a aria-label="26 comments" class="fc-trail__count fc-trail__count--commentcount" data-link-name="Comment count" href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2019/oct/24/doxiepoos-and-puggles-is-hybrid-breeding-healthier-for-owners-and-dogs#comments"><span class="inline-tone-fill inline-comment-16 inline-icon"><svg height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="M13 0l1 1v7l-1 1h-6l-2 3h-1v-3h-2l-1-1v-7l1-1h11z"></path></svg></span> 26</a></div>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-hidden="true" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2019/oct/24/doxiepoos-and-puggles-is-hybrid-breeding-healthier-for-owners-and-dogs" tabindex="-1">Is hybrid breeding healthier for owners and dogs?</a>
</div>
</div> </li>
<li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link">

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/fashion/2019/oct/23/headbands-powerbands-accessories"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Heads up</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Why powerbands are not just for Sloanes</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Nothing screams Im posh quite like a headband  but the look once loved by princesses is back, and this time round it is surprisingly wearable
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/ng-interactive/2019/oct/16/the-guardians-climate-pledge-2019"><span class="fc-item__kicker">The Guardian's climate pledge</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Five steps we're taking</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Today, we are making a public pledge to ourselves and our readers that we are committed to taking responsibility for our role  both journalistically and institutionally  on tackling the climate crisis
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-hidden="true" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/ng-interactive/2019/oct/16/the-guardians-climate-pledge-2019" tabindex="-1">Five steps we're taking</a>
</div>
</div> </li>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/oct/19/guardian-climate-pledge-2019-air-travel-advice"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Travel</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">How to explore the world without harming it</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Guardian travel editor Andy Pietrasik explains how a flexitarian approach can enable us to enjoy exploring the planet without increasing our carbon footprint
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-hidden="true" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/oct/19/guardian-climate-pledge-2019-air-travel-advice" tabindex="-1">How to explore the world without harming it</a>

<li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link">
<div class="fc-item fc-item--has-image fc-item--pillar-news fc-item--type-article js-fc-item fc-item--list-media-mobile fc-item--standard-tablet js-snappable" data-id="environment/2019/oct/17/guardian-editors-climate-emergency-pledge" data-item-visibility="all" data-link-name="news | group-0 | card-@3" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/ce7dv" data-test-id="facia-card">
<div class="fc-item__container">
<div class="fc-item__media-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__image-container u-responsive-ratio">
<picture>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/books/booksblog/2019/oct/21/tips-links-and-suggestions-what-are-you-reading-this-week"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Tips, links and suggestions</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">What are you reading?</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Your space to discuss the books you are reading and what you think of them
<br/>
</div>

<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2019/oct/17/social-care-are-you-fighting-to-live-independently-in-your-own-home"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Social care</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Are you fighting to live independently in your own home?</span></span> </a></h3>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/books/2019/oct/23/nick-tosches-obituary"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Nick Tosches obituary</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Rock music journalist and Jerry Lee Lewis biographer</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
American writer who epitomised the rackety world of the 1960s rock press and went on to become a successful biographer
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
<a aria-label="25 comments" class="fc-trail__count fc-trail__count--commentcount" data-link-name="Comment count" href="https://www.theguardian.com/books/2019/oct/23/nick-tosches-obituary#comments"><span class="inline-tone-fill inline-comment-16 inline-icon"><svg height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="M13 0l1 1v7l-1 1h-6l-2 3h-1v-3h-2l-1-1v-7l1-1h11z"></path></svg></span> 25</a></div>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div class="fc-item__container">
<div class="fc-item__media-wrapper">

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2019/oct/23/bitch-bill-ban-massachusetts"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Should we ban the word 'bitch'?</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">The strange proposal perplexing a US state</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
The bill before the Massachusetts legislature has been decried as an assault on free speech  but all may not be as it seems

</div>

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/artanddesign/gallery/2019/oct/23/down-with-god-how-the-soviet-union-took-on-religion-in-pictures"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Down with God!</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">How the Soviet Union took on religion</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Marx said that religion was the opium of the people  and in the Soviet Union atheism became government policy, enforced by the state and encouraged by anti-religious posters and magazines
</div>
<div class="fc-item__footer-meta-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__meta-wrapper">

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/gallery/2019/oct/23/wildlife-corridors-to-save-borneo-elephants-in-pictures"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Environment</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Wildlife corridors to save Borneo elephants</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
Malaysia and Indonesia produce more than 85% of the worlds palm oil, which cultivation and production have caused deforestation, water pollution, air pollution, land degradation and human-wildlife conflict. Deforestation has endangered the Borneo elephant, isolating it from large foraging grounds. Now, some plantations are working with WWF-Malaysia to create ecological corridors to enable elephants to travel between forest patches
</div>
<div class="fc-item__footer-meta-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__meta-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__media-meta">
<span class="inline-camera inline-icon">
<svg class="inline-camera__svg inline-icon__svg" height="13" viewbox="0 0 18 13" width="18">
<path d="M18 3.5v8L16.5 13h-15L0 11.5v-8L1.5 2H5l2-2h4l2 2h3.5L18 3.5zM9 11c1.9 0 3.5-1.6 3.5-3.5S10.9 4 9 4 5.5 5.6 5.5 7.5 7.1 11 9 11z"></path>
</svg> </span>
<span class="u-h">Gallery</span>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div> </li>

<div class="fc-item__content">
<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/music/gallery/2019/oct/22/turbulent-indigos-glorious-joni-mitchell-watercolours-in-pictures"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Turbulent indigos</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Glorious Joni Mitchell watercolours</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">
In 1971 Joni Mitchell gave 100 of her closest friends a handmade copy of The Christmas Book, a collection of early songs, poems and watercolours. It is now being published more than 40 years later as Morning Glory on the Vine
</div>
<div class="fc-item__footer-meta-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__meta-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__media-meta">
<span class="inline-camera inline-icon">

<div class="fc-item__media-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__image-container u-responsive-ratio">

<div class="fc-item__header">
<h3 class="fc-item__title"><a class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article" href="https://www.theguardian.com/cities/2019/oct/22/ingenuity-south-africa-architect-kevin-kimwelle-builds-with-trash"><span class="fc-item__kicker">'There is ingenuity in Africa'</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">The architect who builds with trash</span></span> </a></h3>
</div>
<div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">
<div class="fc-item__standfirst">

</div>
<div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta">
</div>
</div>
</div>

<h2 class="moment-banner__title-one">We will not stay quiet </h2>
<h2 class="moment-banner__title-two">on the climate crisis</h2>

<div class="moment-banner__copy">
<!-- Render bold lead sentence if it exists -->
<span class="moment-banner__copy-in-bold">The climate emergency is the defining issue of our times. </span>
<!-- Render main message text -->
<span class="hide-until-tablet">This is the Guardians pledge: we will be truthful, resolute and undeterred in pursuing Guardian journalism on the environment. We will give global heating, wildlife extinction and pollution the urgent attention they demand. Our independence means we can interrogate inaction by those in power. It means Guardian reporting will always be driven by scientific facts, never by commercial or political interests. Support from our readers makes this work possible.</span>
